#Text=Shaoguan
#Text=Shaoguan ( 韶关 ; Sháoguān ) is a small city in Guangdong Province in China .
#Text=It is famous for its surrounding nature and the hot springs .
#Text=By train
#Text=A train ride from Guangzhou on the slow train takes about 3 hours and should cost ¥ 39 on the hard seater .
#Text=The bullet train from Guangzhou takes about 50 minutes to an hour and 15 minutes and costs between ¥ 70 - 105 depending on speed for a second class seat .
#Text=Shaoguan 's two main train stations are ( 韶关站 ) and ( 韶关东站 ) .
#Text=By plane
#Text=When you get off from Guangzhou Baiyun International Airport , the intercity bus is convenient .
#Text=The price of a ticket is about ¥ 100 .
#Text=Please note that you check the bus with certificate .
#Text=When get off the bus , you can travel around by yourself with the map , that is so fun .
#Text=Get around
#Text=The main bus terminal is just next to the train station .
#Text=Buses leave from here to the major sights .
#Text=Locally operating buses start here , but the town center is within walking distance .
#Text=Just cross the river opposite the train station and you are almost there .
#Text=Tourist guides will occasionally offer their services to newly arrived travellers .
#Text=Prices are subject to negotiation .
#Text=See
#Text=Nanhua Temple ( 南华寺 Nánhuá Sì ; 南华禅寺 Nánhuá Chánsì ) , Qujiang District ( 曲江区 ) ( Special express buses to the temple are available from the Shaoguan East Railway Station .
#Text=If arriving at Shaoguan Railway Station , take bus no . 23 .
#Text=You can also get there via bus no . 309 , which departs from the Shaoguan South Bus Station ) , ☏ +86 751-6501014 .
#Text=8AM-5PM .
#Text=The former temple of Huineng ( the sixth patriarch of Zen Buddhism ) and the location of his mummified remains .
#Text=As such , the temple is an important pilgrimage site for practitioners of Zen Buddhism .
#Text=¥ 20 .
#Text=Danxia Mountains ( 丹霞山 ; Dān xiá shān ) , Renhua County ( 仁化县 ) ( Special express buses are available from both the Shaoguan Railway Station and the Shaoguan East Railway Station .
#Text=Buses take about 50 minutes to get to the park ) , ☏ +86 751-6291683 , ✉ danxiashanaaaa@126.com .
#Text=Open 24 hours a day .
#Text=A canyon like valley carved into the stone .
#Text=The main attractions include an old monastery on top and various formations with sexual characteristics .
#Text=Notable rock formations include Yangyuan Rock ( 阳元石 ) , which resembles a phallus and Yinyuan Rock ( 阴元石 ) , which resembles a vulva .
#Text=¥ 150 for persons aged 18 to 60 , ¥ 75 for persons under 18 or over 60 who provide proof of age .
#Text=Nanling National Forest Park ( 南岭森林公园 ) .
#Text=Located in Ruyuan Yao Nationality Autonomous County , 8 kilometers from the bridge exit of Beijing-Zhuhai Expressway .
#Text=The park covers area of 27300 hectares .
#Text=It is the core zone of Nanling Mountain , the only preserved virgin forest in Guangdong and the oasis with the largest area in the areas with the same latitude in the world .
#Text=The park has developed scenic spots including No.1 Peak in Guangdong ( Shikengkong with altitude of 1902 meters ) , Water Loving Valley , Waterfall Groups and Small Yellow Mountain .
#Text=Guangdong Grand Canyon ( 广东大峡谷 ) .
#Text=The Grand Canyon is located in Guangdong Ruyuan Yao Autonomous Dabu Town , from the Beijing-Zhuhai Expressway in Ruyuan
#Text=export 70kilometers .
#Text=Canyon of up to 15 kilometers , more than 300 meters deep , belong to quartz sandstone .

#Text=The original site of the Grand Canyon is a ravine in small basin , due to the Yanshan movement effects , makes the crust with block uplift of the expansion , and make partial massif rifting subsidence of the formation of rift valley .

#Text=Be aware that the place is not really taken care of and that despite the various maps you will see here and there , you will only be able to access a very small part of the canyon , the rest being closed and under guard .
#Text=The site is not really worth the trip unless you want to see a 100m high but very narrow waterfall .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Restaurants in Shaoguan are not set as densely as in Guangzhou .
#Text=A good place to find many restaurants is Heping Road ( 和平路 ) at the northern end of the main shopping and pedestrian area .
#Text=The choices include a McDonalds and various Chinese cuisines .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Dongyuan Hotel ( 东园招待所 ; Dōng​yuán​ Zhāo​dài​suǒ​ ) ( Next to the river at the junction of Jianguolu ( 健国路 ) and Dongdinanlu ( 东堤南路 ) ) .
#Text=Rooms can be bargained down to ¥ 50 per bed and night .
#Text=Hot Spring Hotel ( 泉景酒店 ; Quán​jǐng​jiǔ​diàn​ ) , 1 Huanyuan West Street ( 环园西路1号 ; Huányuánxīlù ) , ☏ +867518186068 .
#Text=Danxia Hotel ( 大丹霞酒店 ; Dà​dān​xiá​ jiǔ​diàn​ ) , 128 Jiefang Road ( 解放路128号 ; Jiě​fàng​lù​ ) , ☏ +867518188206 .
